attributes.action: Cancel the 2012 Olympic games and use the revenue to improve conditions for the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Olympic concept is thousands of years out of date, billions are wasted on developments and stadiums so we can watch the 'Long Jump' - how exciting! Then the stadiums sit empty. Lets move on and start with things that really matter. The men and women on the Front Line

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
